content:
This site documents the implementation and reproduction of research papers, along with selected notes on technical work and structured thinking.
The primary focus is on implementing and experimentally validating Operations Research models in transportation systems and electricity markets, with applications in EV charging and battery swapping operations, and drone logistics.
Scope Work Posts typically include:
Problem formulation Model derivation Implementation details Numerical experiments Observations and extensions Emphasis is placed on reproducibility and clarity.
Life Occasional notes on tools, workflows, and research-related reflections.
Philosophy Understanding is validated through implementation.
